easierFishingMode_Comment: Mode for mod to run in. false = No Skill Modification, true = Skill Modification.
fishingBarHeight_Comment: Bar height in pixels = fishingBarHeight * 100  (2 = 200 pixels)
fishingSkillValue_Comment: If easierFishingMode is set to true this is the value your Fishing Skill will be set to.
easierFishingDebug_Comment: Enable debug messages in the console.
